verses.text: \w My|strong="H1732"\w* heart \w is|strong="H1732"\w* fixed, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; I \w will|strong="H7892"\w* \w sing|strong="H7892"\w*, yea, I \w will|strong="H7892"\w* \w sing|strong="H7892"\w* \w praises|strong="H7892"\w*, even \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* glory.
Awake, psaltery \w and|strong="H3820"\w* harp: \w I|strong="H3559"\w* \w myself|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* awake \w right|strong="H3559"\w* early.

\w I|strong="H5782"\w* will give thanks unto thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* peoples; \w And|strong="H3658"\w* \w I|strong="H5782"\w* will sing praises unto thee among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* nations.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* lovingkindness \w is|strong="H3068"\w* great above \w the|strong="H3068"\w* heavens; \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* truth \add reacheth\add* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* skies.

\w Be|strong="H8064"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* exalted, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w thy|strong="H8064"\w* glory \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w That|strong="H3605"\w* \w thy|strong="H8064"\w* beloved \w may|strong="H3519"\w* \w be|strong="H8064"\w* delivered, Save \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H8064"\w* right hand, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* answer \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.

God \w hath|strong="H3225"\w* spoken \w in|strong="H6030"\w* \w his|strong="H3467"\w* holiness: I \w will|strong="H4616"\w* exult; I \w will|strong="H4616"\w* divide Shechem, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* mete \w out|strong="H2502"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* valley \w of|strong="H3225"\w* Succoth.

Gilead \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w mine|strong="H1696"\w*; Manasseh \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w mine|strong="H1696"\w*; Ephraim \w also|strong="H7927"\w* \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* defence \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* head; Judah \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* sceptre.
Moab \w is|strong="H7218"\w* my washpot; \w Upon|strong="H3063"\w* Edom \w will|strong="H3063"\w* I cast my shoe; \w Over|strong="H7218"\w* Philistia \w will|strong="H3063"\w* I shout.

Who \w will|strong="H4124"\w* bring \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fortified city? Who \w hath|strong="H4124"\w* led \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w unto|strong="H7321"\w* Edom?

Hast \w not|strong="H5892"\w* \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* cast us off, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H4310"\w*? \w And|strong="H5892"\w* \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* goest \w not|strong="H5892"\w* \w forth|strong="H2986"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H4310"\w*, \w with|strong="H5892"\w* our hosts.
Give \w us|strong="H2186"\w* help against \w the|strong="H3318"\w* adversary; \w For|strong="H6635"\w* vain \w is|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* help \w of|strong="H6635"\w* man.

Through God \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H6862"\w* do valiantly: \w For|strong="H8668"\w* he it is \w that|strong="H8668"\w* \w will|strong="H6862"\w* tread down our \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*.
